summary:
Experienced Teacher of Science ( Biology and Integrated Sciences). Have worked in the UK and Scotland, Belgium and the Netherlands. 
Experience in International schools with MYP and IB Curricula. 
Strong commitment to education outreach, preparation of educational projects and didactics(STEM) within the education office of the European Space Agency.
Master of Education (MEd) with emphasis of Contemporary issues in Science Learning and Leadership and Learning. 
Worked with students requiring additional learning support. 
Qualified therapeutic counsellor.
